MemoryConfigs.Name: Customize Max Stash Gold
MemoryConfigs.Description: Allows you to control the maximum gold able to be stored in your stash

MemoryConfigs.Name: Customize Max Character Gold
MemoryConfigs.Description: Allows you to control the maximum gold able to be stored on your player (Character Level x Value)

MemoryConfigs.Name: Player Difficulty Scaling Override (Max/UI)
MemoryConfigs.Description: Allows you to control the maximum player difficulty. These addresses are for UI and client checks

MemoryConfigs.Name: Force Classic Whirlwind
MemoryConfigs.Description: Changes the WW BP calcs to use 1FPA attacks instead of 4FPA for max speed

MemoryConfigs.Name: Player Difficulty Scaling Override (Command)
MemoryConfigs.Description: Allows you to control the maximum player difficulty. This address is for the player command

MemoryConfigs.Name: Player Difficulty Scaling Override (Actual)
MemoryConfigs.Description: Allows you to control the maximum player difficulty. This address is for the server value

MemoryConfigs.Name: Hit Chance % (Lower Bound)
MemoryConfigs.Description: Changes the lower bound for hit% rates (monster and player)

MemoryConfigs.Name: Hit Chance % (Upper Bound)
MemoryConfigs.Description: Changes the lower bound for hit% rates (monster and player)

MemoryConfigs.Name: Hit Chance % (Display Fix)
MemoryConfigs.Description: This will allow 0% value to be shown on character stats screen if lower bound edits are used

MemoryConfigs.Name: Disable Run Penalty for Defense
MemoryConfigs.Description: This will disable run penalties. The animation mode used for the check is invalid
